::KitKat::

"I love you too."
She looked down and felt her hand in his. She still felt the pain in 
her spark for doing what she did.  She had to try to live with this 
pain for the rest of her life.  It was torture unlike any she had 
ever elt or experienced.  She thought how she'd rather be tortured by 
the maximals than suffer with this burden.

She couldn't help but cry.  She put her arms around Drillbit and wept 
on his shoulder.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He sat up, and looked into her eyes. He didn't know what to do.
> He took her hand. 
> "It will be ok. You did what you thought was right. It was. Land 
mine
> will fare better in the Matrix, then with Deemos." He kissed her
> slightly.
> "I love you."
